transArray.content: This is the first time I live in Citigo. Their home is very cost-effective and the location is very good. It is very close to the subway station of Line 7. Next to it is Xianyukou Food Street and Dashilan. It is very convenient to go to the Tiananmen Temple of Heaven in the Forbidden City. If you want to buy authentic Beijing There is also one near Sanhe Daoxiang Village. You can go to the terminal of Universal Studios Line 7. The service is also good. The room is cleaned every day. Next time you come to Beijing, you will choose their houseüòè
